org.joty.workstation.gui

Class JotyCalendarPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.joty.workstation.gui.Panel
              • org.joty.workstation.gui.JotyCalendarPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JotyCalendarPanel
extends Panel
    The Joty implementation of a matrix calendar window.

    It shows a matrix of days of the currently showed month, grouped in columns as days of week. Then, two 'up' and 'down' buttons are available for the selection of the year and a pull-down menu is for the selection of the month.

    Its gates for the interaction with the hosting visual environment are the setDate method and an implementor of the DateActor interface specified by means of the setActor method: the action method will be called upon user action on the calendar.

    See Also:
